entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
